description: we crafted our margaux mini satchel from luxe calf hair in a fierce leopard print and trimmed it with the original refined grain leather for a trendy twist on a timeless silhouette. defined by its curved, feminine silhouette, molded handles and functional interior, margaux features two slip pockets and a domed zipper compartment, inspired by the lines of a scallop, with even more storage space inside. an adjustable crossbody strap gives you the option to go hands-free. the leather luggage tag is finished with an enamel spade.
title: margaux haircalf mini satchel

description: as seen on our fall 2019 runway: the nicola twistlock small convertible shoulder bag in our new luxe python-embossed italian leather. true to the original handbag of the same name, its strong silhouette is balanced with soft, feminine details like rounded corners and refined, jewelry-like hardware, including a beautiful chain strap that doubles for a shorter look. a spade heart twistlock with a (very) satisfying 'click' closure adorns the front; the plunge on the back slip pocket is a seductively subtle nod to the curves of our signature mark. inside, a zipper pocket and additional slip pocket keep your essentials organized.
title: nicola snake embossed twistlock small convertible chain shoulder bag

description: our nicola twistlock flap chain wallet is crafted from smooth italian leather, with a vibrant leopard-print calf hair flap and a mini spade heart twistlock closure. inside, there's space and pockets for your growing card and receipt collection, plus a few lipsticks. wear it with a bigger satchel like we showed on our fall 2019 runway, or detach the jewelry-like chain strap to carry it as a clutch or use as a pouch in another bag.
title: nicola haircalf twistlock chain wallet

description: as seen on our fall 2019 runway: the nicola twistlock small convertible shoulder bag in luxe calf hair printed with fierce leopard spots. true to the original handbag of the same name, its strong silhouette is balanced with soft, feminine details like rounded corners and refined, jewelry-like hardware, including a beautiful chain strap that doubles for a shorter look. a spade heart twistlock with a (very) satisfying 'click' closure adorns the front; the plunge on the back slip pocket is a seductively subtle nod to the curves of our signature mark. inside, a zipper pocket and additional slip pocket keep your essentials organized.
title: nicola haircalf twistlock small convertible chain shoulder bag

description: we finished the refined grain leather of our margaux medium convertible crossbody with a fierce leopard pattern for a playful twist on a sleek silhouette. don't let its narrowness fool you. there are pockets and cardholders to store lots of your essentials, and an adjustable crossbody strap that clips off, transforming the bag into a clutch.
title: margaux leopard medium convertible crossbody

description: we printed the refined grain leather of our margaux large satchel with a fierce leopard pattern for a playful twist on a timeless silhouette. defined by its curved, feminine silhouette, molded handles and functional interior, margaux features two slip pockets and a domed zipper compartment, inspired by the lines of a scallop, with even more storage space inside. an adjustable crossbody strap gives you the option to go hands-free. the leather luggage tag is finished with an enamel spade.
title: margaux leopard large satchel

description: we updated our margaux medium satchel in deep navy denim for fall--it's a mix of polished and casual we're really feeling right now. it's a bag timelessly defined by its curved, feminine silhouette, molded handles and functional interior, with two slip pockets and a domed zipper compartment, inspired by the lines of a scallop, with even more storage space inside. an adjustable crossbody strap gives you the option to go hands-free, and the leather luggage tag is finished with an enamel spade.
title: margaux denim medium satchel

description: from the soft pebbled leather to the pretty tonal enamel spade, we think this polly slim bifold wallet is just dreamy. but don't be deceived by its name. once opened, this petite piece reveals six credit card slots, a zipper coin pocket and an i.d. holder.
title: polly small slim bifold wallet

description: a chic and functional way to hold your cards, cash and love notes. we filled this elegant wallet with plenty of slots (those curves you see are inspired by the lines of a scallop) and pockets so organizing will never be an issue again. we also made it in our crossgrain leather to stay pristine for years to come.
title: sylvia medium bifold wallet

description: you might recognize this bold medium satchel from our fall 2019 runway show. romy is hard to miss with its fierce python-embossed italian leather. inside, you'll find a buttery-soft faux microsuede lining and a large slip pocket spacious enough to hold a small wallet. an optional and adjustable strap allows you to sling it over your shoulder when you need a free hand for hot chocolate. and don't worry about setting it down--the tiny feet will keep it beautiful for years to come. our spade heart twistlock doubles as clever d√©cor and a very pretty closure.
title: romy snake-embossed medium satchel

description: our out west collection pays homage to the whimsical spirit of the west--our design inspiration this fall. while few could argue that a black crepe mini skirt is anything but cosmopolitan, there's a little bit of cowgirl in this version.
title: crepe studded skirt

description: our story begins in 1993 with a boxy, black nylon handbag called sam. we wanted something utilitarian and timeless--a bag that could go with everything from jeans to a cocktail dress. sam did, and women and fashion editors alike swooned. this year for our 25th anniversary, we brought back sam in a bevy of colors and sizes you'll want to lovingly hold and gaze at for years to come.
title: washington square sam

description: with engraved grosgrain ribbon and bow grace avenue adds the perfect touch to a playful finish.
title: grace avenue ring holder

description: our delightful larabee dot design makes a case for the polka dot as the ultimate chic motif, and our champagne flutes and stemless wine glasses are the perfect case in point with their etched crystal accents and sleek shape.
title: larabee dot decanter

description: this pretty polka-dotted baking dish can go straight from the oven to your table, and is perfect for everything from meats to veggies to lasagna to desserts. (a note at the bottom reminds you to "dive in.")
title: dive in baking dish

description: this pretty piece will keep you warm and chic when the temperature drops. (your winter wardrobe s not complete without it.)
title: mega check scarf

description: a picture's worth a thousand words, but here's a special one to start.
title: in a word 5x7 frame

description: pasta lovers, cooks and hostesses, rejoice--this charming set covers all your foodie prep and presentation needs.
title: pasta rectangular food storage container

description: with its sleek shape and snap-close top, the cameron street brennan can be carried crossbody or clutch-style, making it a perfect match for everything from dresses to jeans. did we mention it s made from crosshatched leather that's scratch-resistant and wipes clean, too?
title: cameron street brennan

description: recapture the rosy glow of your loveliest memories with this rose gold and silver-hued ring dish.
title: rosy glow ring dish

description: those with a propensity toward flowery language will adore this ballpoint pen, which inspires an extra little flourish in all matters of handwritten correspondence.
title: always flowers ballpoint pen

description: it's always a good time to add a little shine.
title: heavy metals bow slider bracelet

description: keep sugar, chocolate chips and other staples handy in this glass container, which bears the helpful (and humorous) label, "a little bit of that."
title: little bit of that medium canister

description: functional and feminine is our style motto. this fitted zip-up with sweet scallops and a thumbhole is made of the softest studio jersey (read: it's super-stretchy and quick-drying). wear it from bikram to brunch, pilates to pedicures, spinning to supper...it's very versatile.
title: scallop jacket

description: keep flour, pasta and other essentials fresh in this glass container, which bears the helpful (and humorous) label, "a little bit of this."
title: little bit of this large canister

description: even note-taking and list-making can be a joy when you're using our golden floral large spiral notebook. it's a worthy receptacle for all of your brightest ideas.
title: golden floral large spiral notebook

description: your i.d. is very personal, so the thing that holds it should be too.
title: initial i.d. holder

description: made from textured coated fabric with bold white and cream stripes, the hyde lane stripe riley adds a classic touch to any ensemble. a spacious, open-topped tote, it's well-suited to commuting, running errands, shopping and other pursuits that might require a bit of heavy lifting.
title: hyde lane riley

description: functional and feminine is our style motto. this cropped black legging is finished with sweet scallops and made of the softest studio jersey (read: they're super-stretchy and quick-drying). wear them from bikram to brunch, pilates to pedicures, spinning to supper...they're very versatile.
title: scallop crop legging

description: a simple, boxy bag with two zippered compartments, the cameron street clarise can be carried crossbody or clutch-style, making it a perfect match for everything from dresses to jeans.
title: cameron street clarise

description: as seen on our fall 2019 runway. the nicola snake-embossed twistlock small top handle bag is a petite, structured take on our original shoulder bag of the same name. crafted from luxe python-embossed italian leather, it features a clever spade heart twistlock closure that opens up to a spacious interior with slip pockets for organization. the plunge on the back slip pocket is a seductively subtle nod to the curves of our signature mark. and the optional and adjustable shoulder strap is there for those times your hands are already occupied.
title: nicola snake embossed twistlock small top handle bag

description: as seen on our fall 2019 runway: the nicola twistlock small convertible shoulder bag in leopard-print italian leather with an eye-catching metallic finish. true to the original handbag of the same name, its strong silhouette is balanced with soft, feminine details like rounded corners and refined, jewelry-like hardware, including a beautiful chain strap that doubles for a shorter look. a spade heart twistlock with a (very) satisfying 'click' closure adorns the front; the plunge on the back slip pocket is a seductively subtle nod to the curves of our signature mark. inside, a zipper pocket and additional slip pocket keep your essentials organized.
title: nicola metallic leopard twistlock small convertible chain shoulder bag

description: as seen on our fall 2019 runway: the nicola twistlock medium convertible shoulder bag in luxe calf hair printed with fierce leopard spots. true to the original handbag of the same name, its strong silhouette is balanced with soft, feminine details like rounded corners and refined, jewelry-like hardware, including a beautiful chain strap that doubles for a shorter look. a spade heart twistlock with a (very) satisfying 'click' closure adorns the front; the plunge on the back slip pocket is a seductively subtle nod to the curves of our signature mark. inside, a zipper pocket and additional slip pocket keep your essentials organized.
title: nicola haircalf twistlock medium convertible chain shoulder bag

description: this bag might be mini, but it does quite a lot. the margaux east west crossbody--made from refined grain leather--features so many pockets to organize your things. one at the front, one at the back and six card slots at the interior, to be exact. another fun fact: the jewelry-like chain strap is detachable, so it can be worn as a clutch should your outfits require it.
title: margaux east west crossbody

description: our margaux medium satchel is defined by its curved, feminine silhouette, molded handles and functional interior. crafted from refined grain leather, it features two slip pockets and a domed zipper compartment, inspired by the lines of a scallop, with even more storage space inside. an adjustable crossbody strap gives you the option to go hands-free. the leather luggage tag is finished with an enamel spade, our signature mark.
title: margaux medium satchel

description: our candid medium camera bag gets a luxe spin for fall in smooth italian suede and leather. one of our most functional crossbodies to date, it has multiple slip pockets on the inside and out, which means space for the important things with rummage-free access when you need them. once closed, a push-stud at the side locks the zipper into place to keep it all safe. and the twill strap is both adjustable and detachable, plus flips to another color to go with all your looks. and the multicolored smooth italian leather and optional luggage tag make it just as beautiful as it is practical.
title: candid suede medium camera bag

description: our candid medium camera bag gets a fierce spin for fall in metallic leopard-print smooth italian leather. one of our most functional crossbodies to date, it has multiple slip pockets on the inside and out, which means space for the important things with rummage-free access when you need them. once closed, a push-stud at the side locks the zipper into place to keep it all safe. and the twill strap is both adjustable and detachable, plus flips to another color to go with all your looks. and the multicolored smooth italian leather and optional luggage tag make it just as beautiful as it is practical.
title: candid metallic leopard medium camera bag

description: our margaux slim continental wallet is defined by its curved, feminine silhouette and functional interior. crafted from refined grain leather, it features 12 card slots, two billfold compartments, one middle zip pocket and a slip pocket on the outside. a foil embossed logo is the beautiful finishing touch.
title: margaux slim continental wallet

description: here's a wallet on a chain that also fits your actual wallet should you want to carry that, too. we love the clean, boxy shape constructed from durable crossgrain leather appliqu√©d with eye-catching spade clovers. functionality-wise, the domed slip pocket on the back and zipper pocket inside are very handy. we usually wear it as a crossbody, but it works over your shoulder or as a clutch for fancier situations.
title: sylvia graphic clover appliqu√© chain wallet

description: here's a classic wallet to hold your cards, cash and change for years to come. don't let the slim profile fool you: lots of pockets and compartments inside give you plenty of space to organize. it's made from durable crossgrain leather, appliqu√©d with eye-catching spade clovers, to keep it in pristine condition, too.
title: sylvia graphic clover appliqu√© slim continental wallet

description: slim continental wallet is defined by its curved, feminine silhouette and functional interior. crafted from refined grain leather, it features 12 card slots, 2 billfold compartments, 1 middle zip pocket and a slip pocket on the outside. a foil emboss logo is the beautiful finishing touch.
title: cameron large continental wallet

description: here's a printed cardholder you'll have for years to come. the pretty domed pockets on both sides give you plenty of space, because we all know your card collection will grow over time. it's made from durable faux leather in our meadow print to keep it in pristine condition, too.
title: sylvia meadow card holder

description: here's a classic wallet to hold your cards, cash and change for years to come. don't let the slim profile fool you: when unzipped, it expands to reveal lots of pockets and compartments inside to give you plenty of space to organize. it's made from durable crossgrain leather to keep it in pristine condition, too.
title: sylvia large continental wallet

description: here's a classic wallet to hold your cards, cash and change for years to come. don't let the slim profile fool you: lots of pockets and compartments inside give you plenty of space to organize. it's made from durable crossgrain leather to keep it in pristine condition, too.
title: sylvia slim continental wallet

description: here's a classic bifold wallet to hold your cards, cash, change and love notes for years to come. don't let the slim profile fool you: lots of pockets inside give you plenty of space to organize. it's made from durable crossgrain leather to keep it in pristine condition, too.
title: sylvia small slim bifold wallet

description: here's a classic mini keyring wallet you'll have for years to come. the pretty domed slots and zipper coin pocket give you plenty of space, because we all know your card (and receipt) collection will grow over time.
title: sylvia mini key ring wallet

description: our spencer continental wallet is done in a new saffiano leather we introduced this summer. its soft texture is nice to touch and durable against drops and scratches so it'll keep its sleek, luxe look. of course, we made this wallet as functional as it is beautiful: unsnapping it reveals that the spade flower jacquard-lined interior is filled with plenty of slots, slip pockets and zipper pockets for your current and growing card and receipt collection.
title: spencer zip-around continental wallet

description: our spencer compact wallet is done in a new saffiano leather we introduced this summer. its soft texture is nice to touch and durable against drops and scratches so it'll keep its sleek, luxe look. of course, we made this wallet as functional as it is beautiful: unsnapping it reveals that the spade flower jacquard-lined interior is filled with plenty of slots, slip pockets and zipper pockets for your current and growing card and receipt collection.
title: spencer compact wallet

description: the nicola twistlock flap continental wallet is true to the original handbag of the same name. crafted from smooth italian leather, it features a mini spade heart twistlock closure that opens up to plenty of slots (10 to be exact) for your growing card and receipt collection. slip it in your favorite handbag or carry it on its own as a clutch.
title: nicola twistlock flap continental wallet

description: our margaux slim continental wallet is defined by its curved, feminine silhouette and functional interior. crafted from refined grain leather, it features 12 card slots, two billfold compartments, one middle zip pocket and a slip pocket on the outside. a foil embossed logo is the beautiful finishing touch.
title: margaux slim continental wallet

description: platforms are having a moment. so we made our grace sandals sky-high and easy to walk in. the supple leather, crisscross vamp straps and buckled ankle strap are classic details that come together to create a '70s-ish vibe.
title: grace platform sandals

description: here's our feminine twist on a menswear-inspired staple. featuring classic details like a pleated front, creased legs and side and back pockets, these trousers are updated with a slender adjustable d-ring belt and flattering, wide-leg silhouette. the best part: the airy crepe suiting fabric makes it an ideal transitional piece when the weather starts to cool down. try it with a matching blazer or printed blouse.
title: draped suiting pant

description: here's a printed bifold wallet to hold your cards, cash, change and love notes for years to come. don't let the slim profile fool you: lots of pockets inside give you plenty of space to organize. it's made from durable faux leather in our meadow print to keep it in pristine condition, too.
title: sylvia meadow small slim bifold wallet

description: here's a way to keep all of your absolute, can't-leave-the-house-withouts in one place. our small keyring wallet has card slots, slip pockets, a zippered coin compartment and a clip for your house keys. other important details worth noting: it's made from refined grain leather and has a round slip pocket on the back is inspired by the curves of a scallop.
title: margaux small key ring wallet

description: the margaux flap cardholder fits in your mini bags and still has enough room for your important credit cards, i.d., receipts, love notes... there is one slot at the back, one inside, and a small interior compartment, if we're talking numbers. the luxe refined grain leather and spade floral jacquard lining are just the icing on top of the cake.
title: margaux flap card case

description: this solid sheath dress in rich burgundy is destined to become the center of all your looks for fall. (and winter, spring and summer.) the v-neck, short puff sleeves and self-tie belt create a silhouette that's strong enough all on its own. but it also looks just as cute should you choose to layer it over a turtleneck or silky blouse. the supple lambskin leather with a silky satin lining makes it feel just as luxurious as it looks.
title: leather tie waist dress

description: this polished blouse is a true closet staple. and the silk cr√™pe de chine is just as soft as it looks, so you'll actually want to wear it with everything. we added classic menswear-inspired touches, like the point collar and barrel cuffs. it's sure to be your go-to layering piece under all your dresses and sweaters. we love it so much, we sent it down the runway in multiple colors for our fall 2019 fashion show.
title: silk point collar blouse

description: this polished blouse is a true closet staple. and the silk cr√™pe de chine is just as soft as it looks, so you'll actually want to wear it with everything. we added classic menswear-inspired touches, like the point collar and barrel cuffs. it's sure to be your go-to layering piece under all your dresses and sweaters. we love it so much, we sent it down the runway in multiple colors for our fall 2019 fashion show.
title: silk point collar blouse

description: here's a coat that'll ease the transition into fall in the most stylish way. cut from cotton-linen canvas, this relaxed style is lightweight and breathable, so it works when temperatures rise and dip. epaulettes and multiple front pockets give this piece a subtle military-inspired feel to one of our favorite fall trends: leopard print.
title: panthera coat

description: we took the timeless polo sweater and updated it with playful design details like a metallic pointelle-stitched front and a contrasting-colored back and sleeves. its stretchy, breathable fabric allows it to transition with ease from season to season. tuck it into flared trousers or jeans to enhance the '70s inspiration behind this top.
title: metallic textured polo sweater

description: we intarsia-knit this cardigan with one of our favorite fall patterns: leopard spots. but what makes this sweater really special is the hint of cashmere we wove into the cotton body to give it an extra soft feel. try it buttoned up on its own or layer it over a collared shirt for a more polished look.
title: panther intarsia cardigan

description: for fall, we reimagined our classic margaux large satchel with crinkled patent trim. (we're feeling its subtle glamour.) it's a bag defined by a curved, feminine silhouette, molded handles and functional interior, with two slip pockets and a domed zipper compartment, inspired by the lines of a scallop, with even more storage space inside. an adjustable crossbody strap gives you the option to go hands-free, and the leather luggage tag is finished with an enamel spade.
title: margaux patent large satchel

description: an a-line pinafore dress in a colorblock of blue and navy stretch-cotton denim with classic details like a button placket, scoopneck and side seam pockets. we sent it down our fall 2019 runway over a silky point-collar blouse and tights, but it can be layered over just about anything from tees to sweaters.
title: denim pinafore dress

description: we're really into jewel tones for fall, so we made this midi dress from rumpled satin in a vibrant lilac-pink hue. (it's called ruffled pansy.) the wide sleeves, flowy, layered skirt, and crisscross wrap front are just a few other touches that make this dress so eye catching. we sent it down our fall 2019 runway over a contrasting point collar blouse and shimmery tights, but it looks just as cute with boots and some sparkly jewelry.
title: satin tie dress

description: this panthera blouse made its debut on our fall 2019 runway. you might recognize it from the fierce leopard print. (it's one of our favorite trends for fall.) if you look closely at the silk chiffon, you'll catch the tonal polka dots woven throughout. they add a pretty touch of texture to the bold spots. the ruched puff sleeves and keyhole front add to the overall femininity of this piece. style it with flared pants and a turban like we did in our show to enhance the ‚Äô70s inspiration behind this piece.
title: panthera chiffon blouse

description: this season, lilac is our neutral--and you'll find this coat truly goes with just about everything. we stayed true to the classic trench with a notched collar, adjustable button-tab cuffs and gun flap. the optional self-tie belt cinches the waist to your ideal fit, and the lightweight tech taffeta almost makes it feel like you're not wearing it at all.
title: taffeta tie waist trench

description: one of our favorite trends for fall is leopard print--and we just love the way it pops here in shades of pink. we also love how this sleeveless style's unique twist-knotted neck adds sophistication in a fresh way. and its lightweight cr√™pe de chine makes it the ideal transitional piece when summer begins to come to an end. the beauty of it? you can throw it on with anything from a skirt to jeans and instantly look polished.
title: panthera twist neck shell

description: the pretty look of a midi dress in the comfort of a jumpsuit, done in leopard print, one of our favorite fall trends. small design details, like a mock wrap front and self-tie waist, add to the overall sophistication of this piece. its lightweight cr√™pe de chine makes it the ideal transitional piece when summer begins to come to an end. the true beauty of it? you can throw this jumpsuit on with anything from pumps to boots and it always looks polished.
title: panthera tie waist jumpsuit

description: we took this menswear-inspired shirtdress and updated it with feminine details like a self-tie waist and smocked back, and added a rumpled effect for a play on texture. the contrasting point collar and logo-detailed pearlescent buttons are unique finishing touches we love. try it with pumps and tights or knee-high boots.
title: satin smocked back shirtdress

description: here's skirt that'll ease the transition into fall in the most stylish way. cut from cotton-linen canvas, this a-line midi is lightweight and breathable to ensure comfort when temperatures rise and dip. belt loops and oversized flap front pockets give this piece a subtle military-inspired feel. we finished it with one of our favorite fall trends: leopard print.
title: panthera canvas skirt

description: we think solid pants can make just as much of a statement as printed ones, especially when they're cut with flattering flared hems. our stretchy basket weave cotton blend makes these pants feel just as nice as they look. we love how versatile they are, so we sent them down the runway in multiple colors at our fall 2019 show.
title: heather basket weave flare pant

description: we think solid pants can make just as much of a statement as printed ones, especially when they're cut with flattering flared hems. our stretchy basket weave cotton blend makes these pants feel just as nice as they look. we love how versatile they are, so we sent them down the runway in multiple colors at our fall 2019 show.
title: heather basket weave flare pant

description: these colorful rubber flip-flops are comfortable enough to throw on poolside, at the gym, running errands‚Ä¶and pretty enough so you won't mind wearing them everywhere you go.
title: nicki sandals

description: our cecilia pumps are destined to become your go-to shoe for weddings, date nights, the office...even the grocery store, if that's your thing. made of silky-soft satin, this ultra-sophisticated pair is detailed with a sleek stiletto heel and peep toe. we topped this pair with a matching bow for the finishing touch.
title: cecilia pumps

description: our cecilia pumps are destined to become your go-to shoe for weddings, date nights, the office...even the grocery store, if that's your thing. made of silky-soft satin, this ultra-sophisticated pair is detailed with a sleek stiletto heel and peep toe. we topped this pair with a matching bow for the finishing touch.
title: cecilia pumps

description: this is that little black sheath dress you can wear with, well...everything in your closet. and the paneled stretchy ponte makes it so it's not too tight, not too loose--just super comfortable, so you'll actually want to wear it all the time. and the classic details, like the jewel neck and fit-and-flare silhouette, make this dress look just as good as it feels.
title: ponte paneled dress

description: one of our favorite trends for fall (and anytime, really) is leopard print. we added it to this mini shirtdress in shades of pink for an added feminine twist to this menswear-inspired silhouette. lightweight cr√™pe de chine makes it the ideal transitional piece when summer comes to an end. wear it with loafers or pumps on warmer days, and when the weather cools down, try it with tights and knee-high boots like how we styled it on our fall 2019 runway.
title: panthera shirtdress

description: the kylah is our elevated take on a classic pump. crafted of soft suede, this pair is updated with a sleek square toe. and we added a chunky heel, because we love that it's equally comfortable as it is chic.
title: kylah pumps

description: our serene pumps come in the most luxe materials, like patent leather, supple suede and leopard-print calf hair. and they boast so many timeless details, like a slender ankle strap and sleek almond toe. it all feels so ‚Äô40s. we added a chunky heel that looks cool, but also makes this pair easy to wear through the work day and into happy hour.
title: serene pumps

description: crafted of supple suede, our elegant, pointed-toe vikki pumps are elevated with a velvet scrunchie-inspired instep strap for a playful touch. they'll look cute with all your minis and midis, or use them to dress up a tee and jeans.
title: vikki pumps

description: these colorful rubber flip-flops are comfortable enough to throw on poolside, at the gym, running errands‚Ä¶and pretty enough so you won't mind wearing them everywhere you go.
title: nicki sandals

description: one of our favorite trends for fall (and anytime, really) is leopard print. we added it to this mini shirtdress in shades of pink for an added feminine twist to this menswear-inspired silhouette. lightweight cr√™pe de chine makes it the ideal transitional piece when summer comes to an end. wear it with loafers or pumps on warmer days, and when the weather cools down, try it with tights and knee-high boots like how we styled it on our fall 2019 runway.
title: panthera shirtdress

description: rain shouldn't mean sacrificing style. so we made our sally boots from matte rubber in shades that will match (and look good) with almost everything in your closet. plus they'll keep you dry through sprinkles and thunderstorms.
title: sally boots

description: crafted of supple suede, our elegant, pointed-toe vikki pumps are elevated with a velvet scrunchie-inspired instep strap for a playful touch. they'll look cute with all your minis and midis, or use them to dress up a tee and jeans.
title: vikki pumps

description: we embellished our lana shoes with a chic metal bar and signature spade detail. and once you feel their soft leather shell and lining, you'll be wearing them long after the work day has ended. who said loafers were just for the office anyway?
title: lana flats

description: think of our fallyn flats as an ode to classic ballet shoes. but since you'll be wearing these a lot more places than the dance studio, we elevated this pair with luxe patent leather and a little bit of heel for some lift. warning: these might induce twirling.
title: fallyn flats

description: the kylah is our elevated take on a classic pump. crafted of luxe materials like soft suede and patent leather, this pair is updated with a sleek square toe. and we added a chunky heel, because we love that it's equally comfortable as it is chic.
title: kylah pumps

description: these leg-lengthening platforms made their debut on our fall 2019 runway and they have so many details we're in love with: the chunky heel that's not too high and not too short, the feminine ankle strap, a peep toe silhouette. all of it comes together to create that sophisticated ‚Äô70s vibe. the plunging vamp, inspired by the curves of our spade, is the signature finishing touch.
title: perry platform pumps

description: these leg-lengthening platforms made their debut on our fall 2019 runway and they have so many details we're in love with: the chunky heel that's not too high and not too short, the feminine ankle strap, a peep toe silhouette. all of it comes together to create that sophisticated ‚Äô70s vibe. the plunging vamp, inspired by the curves of our spade, is the signature finishing touch.
title: perry platform pumps

description: we gave our darien loafers a squared toe as a sleek update to the classic menswear-inspired silhouette. the supple leather lining makes these feel just as good as they look. and you might recongize the metal detail on the strap--we took the spade heart twistlock from our bags and reimagined it here as a finishing touch.
title: darien loafers

description: here's a mini bag you can wear on its own or with a larger one--we're loving the double bag look right now. its rounded rectangular shape is made from refined grain leather and it has a creamy lining that reminds us of cake (you know how we feel about that). we gave it two zippers, which may seem like a lot given its small size, but once you get used to the functionality you'll never look back.
title: margaux double zip mini crossbody

description: our margaux large satchel is defined by its curved, feminine silhouette, molded handles and functional interior. crafted from refined grain leather, it features two slip pockets and a domed zipper compartment, inspired by the lines of a scallop, with even more storage space inside. an adjustable crossbody strap gives you the option to go hands-free. the leather luggage tag is finished with an enamel spade, our signature mark.
title: margaux large satchel

description: our margaux large work tote is defined by its curved, feminine silhouette, molded handles, functional, and roomy, interior. crafted from refined grain leather, it features a creamy lining that reminds us of cake (and you know how we feel about that). the luggage tag on the handle has an upside down spade that's reminiscent of a heart. and it's true to its name: the inside is filled with tons of pockets to hold all the important things--including a snap-tab slide pocket that fits two phones and a padded center zip divider to keep your 13-inch laptop safe and sound.
title: margaux large work tote

description: we consider this bag a purse for your laptop. so of course we think it should be as chic as any other handbag we make. it's made from durable crossgrain leather to withstand scratches and mishaps--because stuff happens. and it's a universal size so it fits all laptops, which means you won't have to upgrade when you get a bigger or smaller computer.
title: margaux universal laptop bag

description: our margaux mini satchel is defined by its curved, feminine silhouette, molded handles and functional interior. crafted from refined grain leather, it features two slip pockets and a domed zipper compartment, inspired by the lines of a scallop, with even more storage space inside. an adjustable crossbody strap gives you the option to go hands-free. the leather luggage tag is finished with an enamel spade.
title: margaux mini satchel

description: our margaux large tote is defined by its curved, feminine silhouette, molded handles, functional, and roomy, interior. crafted from refined grain leather, it features a creamy lining that reminds us of cake (and you know how we feel about that) and a pocket inside. the luggage tag on the handle has an upside down spade that's reminiscent of a heart.
title: margaux large tote

description: we crafted our latest margaux medium convertible crossbody from luxe calf hair in a fierce leopard-print and trimmed it with the original refined grain leather for a trendy twist on a sleek silhouette. don't let its demure size fool you: there are pockets and cardholders to store lots of your essentials, and an adjustable crossbody strap that clips off, transforming the bag into a clutch.
title: margaux haircalf medium convertible crossbody

description: as seen on our fall 2019 runway: the nicola twistlock small convertible shoulder bag in leopard-print italian leather with an eye-catching metallic finish. true to the original handbag of the same name, its strong silhouette is balanced with soft, feminine details like rounded corners and refined, jewelry-like hardware, including a beautiful chain strap that doubles for a shorter look. a spade heart twistlock with a (very) satisfying 'click' closure adorns the front; the plunge on the back slip pocket is a seductively subtle nod to the curves of our signature mark. inside, a zipper pocket and additional slip pocket keep your essentials organized.
title: nicola snake embossed twistlock medium convertible shoulder bag

description: if we're being straightforward, the candid medium camera bag is one of our most functional crossbodies to date. it has multiple slip pockets on the inside and out, which means space for the important things with rummage-free access when you need them. and the twill strap is both adjustable and detachable for carrying it as a clutch. the multicolored smooth italian leather and optional luggage tag make it just as beautiful as it is practical.
title: candid medium camera bag

description: if we're being straightforward, the candid medium camera bag is one of our most functional crossbodies to date. it has multiple slip pockets on the inside and out, which means space for the important things with rummage-free access when you need them. and the twill strap is both adjustable and detachable for carrying it as a clutch. the multicolored smooth italian leather and optional luggage tag make it just as beautiful as it is practical.
title: candid medium camera bag

description: as seen on our fall 2019 runway. the nicola twistlock small top handle bag is a petite, structured take on our original shoulder bag of the same name. crafted from smooth italian leather, it features a clever spade heart twistlock closure that opens up to a spacious interior with slip pockets for organization. the plunge on the back slip pocket is a seductively subtle nod to the curves of our signature mark. and the optional and adjustable shoulder strap is there for those times your hands are already occupied.
title: nicola twistlock small top handle bag

description: our romy medium satchel is crafted of both pebbled and smooth italian leather for an unexpected mix of textures. inside, you'll find a buttery-soft faux microsuede lining and a large slip pocket spacious enough to hold a small wallet. an optional and adjustable strap allows you to sling it over your shoulder when you need a free hand for iced coffee. and don't worry about setting it down--the tiny feet will keep it beautiful for years to come. our spade heart twistlock doubles as clever d√©cor and a very pretty closure.
title: romy medium satchel

description: here's a printed wallet to hold your cards, cash and change for years to come. don't let the slim profile fool you: lots of pockets and compartments inside give you plenty of space to organize. it's made from durable crossgrain leather in our swing flora pattern to keep it in pristine condition, too.
title: sylvia swing flora slim continental wallet

description: here's a printed cardholder you'll have for years to come. the pretty domed pockets on both sides give you plenty of space, because we all know your card collection will grow over time. it's made from durable crossgrain leather in our swing flora pattern to keep it in pristine condition, too.
title: sylvia swing flora cardholder

description: the kylah is our elevated take on a classic pump. crafted of luxe materials like soft suede and patent leather, this pair is updated with a sleek square toe. and we added a chunky heel, because we love that it's equally comfortable as it is chic.
title: kylah pumps
